name: Endless Crusade
description: Endless Crusade Previously, we have developed the Age of Heroes, a multiplayer VR combating game. The original Age of Heroes has multiple classes: mage, warlock, archer, priest. Age of Heroes also has 3 raids: Hall of Death, Freezing Stronghold, and Fort of Horror.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD RX480 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: 为了您的游戏顺畅，请更新最新的显卡驱动
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i7 6700K processor equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD R9 FURY X equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: 为了您的游戏顺畅，请更新最新的显卡驱动
